text: 13|42|(napiye!) Ivarkalukku munniruntavarkalum (nam tutarkalukku virotamaka ivvare) pala culccikalaic ceytu kontiruntanar. Eninum, culccikal anaittum allahvitam cikkivitum. (Enenral,) ovvor atmavum ceykinra (culccikal) anaittaiyum avan (tittamaka) nankarikiran. Akave, evarkalutaiya kariyam nanmaiyaka mutiyum enpatai innirakarippavarkal ati cikkirattil arintu kolvarkal
